Reviews.Title: This is not a Samsung smart TV
Reviews.Author: Isuru D.
Reviews.Content: Even though this is a new build of Samsung, It did not come with smart technology. So you won't get cool features that Samsung advertise for their smart TVs.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: benoit joseph
Reviews.Content: This tv is what i have always longing to get ,nice picture ,you could even a pin on the floor .best tv i ever bought good on samsung
